it means that anyone can delete or add files in there if they own them
if permissions are set to 777, does that mean anyone can delete them?
even if they dont own it?
it means anyone may read, write, or execute
if the directory containing it is not using the sticky bit, anyone may delete it
if the sticky bit is there, only the owner may do that
the owner of the file or the owner of the directory
you can learn about all of this from man chmod
